description:
Rasiel (also called Siel) is http://anidb.net/ch3624 [Belphegor]`s older twin brother who possesses the Fake Storm Mare Ring. Similar to Bel, Rasiel is violent and sadistic. He apparently feels superior to Belphegor and gloats over the fact that he, not Bel, is considered the true heir to the throne of their kingdom.
Source: Reborn Wiki
name: Rasiel
